descriptions.content: bskang gso; sometimes skong chog [TBRC T19]. Inciting [the deities and dharma protectors] = bskul ba, bskul tshig, phrin las bskul ba, thugs rje [thugs rje la, thugs rje’i] bskul ba. Part of the four-fold group “bskang ‘phrin bstod bskul” = appeasing, enjoining, praise and inciting. Ex: Dpal chen skal ldan ‘dren mdzad kyi bskang ba shel brag ma (W22642), Karma ‘phrin las kyi bskang gso (W4793).
